segments.text: What good sunshine ! Let's go and get a suntan on the balcony .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've had enough of it while working under the sun in the day . I don't need any more sun-tan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's different in my case . I work in the office , so only rarely do I get the chance to get any sun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It might be good to you . But please keep in mind that too much tanning damages the skin rather than does any good to you . You might end up with skin cancer .
segments.speaker: S2
